subject: Football
Uniforms
Color
Color Blindness
lead_paragraph: The all-green uniforms worn by the Jets and the all-red ones of the Bills turned the viewing experience of Thursday’s matchup into headache-inducing misery for colorblind fans.
snippet: The all-green uniforms worn by the Jets and the all-red ones of the Bills turned the viewing experience of Thursday’s matchup into headache-inducing misery for colorblind fans.
